thread.section_title: Frame My TV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frame My TV | framemytv.com
thread.title: Shannon Mize
thread.title_full: Frame My TV reviewed by Shannon Mize

author: Shannon Mize
title: Shannon Mize
text: After searching for a way to have a tv at our new bar in the basemet for my husband, but not wanting a tv to be the focal point, I found Frame My TV on the internet. My contractor had never heard of or worked with the product, but was willing to give it a try. Wow!! It's the best of both worlds. When the tv is off, we have a beautiful mirror, but can also be ready to watch the game at any given moment. We have enjoyed Frame My TV for nearly 7 years and couldn't be happier.
